name: Ponjan Wii
overview: A table game "Ponjan" which arranged the rules of Mahjong simply appeared in WiiWare. The rule is that participating players will only exchange one of the nine tiles in order with the tiles in the mountain. The player who got 3 "sets" consisting of the same 3 tiles earlier will become effective. By using the Nintendo DS series main unit as a controller, you can play with up to 4 players.
